item.title: Overfull blue bins not emptied, 25th June
item.description:
Hi, It has happened again. The blue bins have been filled by neighbours and passers by with the wrong type of rubbish with the end result that they have not been noticed for 2weeks. Please can you empty them please. And preferably if you can replace the two blue bins with two green bins then that would be amazing. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, Henshaw Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on the way and cuasing pest issue, 25th June
item.description:
There is litter on the way and it is cause problem for pedestrians. Koffi Pot Cafe's bin are kept there is is filled majority of the times. Moreover, he takes out the bins and start throwing near the stairs of the flat. It is even difficult to take small chiller from the way. Rubbish is causing fly, rats and bad smell. Not possible got elder person or kids to move from this way. Need immediate and permanent solution. Can you please put a notice on the wall that throwing rubbish is not allowed. Also, do something about Koffi Pot cafe bins.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
